name: options-bookie
description: A comprehensive options trading tracker with multi-portfolio support and detailed analytics
author: Manohar Mankala <manohar.mankala@gmail.com>

scripts.stop: pkill -f "next.*3007" || kill $(lsof -ti:3007) 2>/dev/null || echo 'No dev server running on port 3007'
scripts.stop:hard: pkill -f "next" && pkill -f "node.*3007" && pkill -f "npm.*dev" || echo 'Killed all Next.js processes'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.db:setup: echo 'Run the SQL in supabase-schema.sql in your Supabase dashboard'
scripts.db:reset: echo 'Reset your Supabase database and run the schema again'
